fullText: Hare has fashioned a work that's as much about the economic and social divisions that define modern Britain as it is about the romantic entanglements of its central characters.
dtliExcerpt: Hare has fashioned a work that's as much about the economic and social divisions that define modern Britain as it is about the romantic entanglements of its central characters.
